summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
cast: Martin Balsam|John Fiedler|Lee J. Cobb|E.G. Marshall|Jack Klugman|Edward Binns|Jack Warden|Henry Fonda|Joseph Sweeney|Ed Begley|George Voskovec|Robert Webber|Rudy Bond|Tom Gorman|James Kelly|Billy Nelson|John Savoca|Walter Stocker
title: 12 hombres sin piedad
